text: haey chaur anak baoh dambng robsa anak choh . haey nowpel del keat bankheunh vea thveu chalnea dauchchea psa noh keat ka rt tralbtowvinh daoy min ngeak kraoy . ( pelnoh trong mean bantoul tha) ao mou sa. chaur anak daerchaul mk haey kom phyokhlach aoy saoh . pitabrakd nasa anak ku sthet knongchamnaom anak del mean sovotthephap
